description: Test file for the newsdataClient module, contains unit tests for parameter normalization, endpoint selection, pagination token handling, and fetch retry logic.

methods.name: normalizeParams
methods.description: Normalizes query parameters for the API request, handling empty strings, date validation, and specific filter values.

methods.name: chooseEndpointPath
methods.description: Determines the API endpoint path based on normalized query parameters.

methods.name: tokenParam
methods.description: Creates the pagination token parameter for API requests, supporting numeric and string tokens.

methods.name: fetchArticles
methods.description: Fetches articles from the API with retry logic on specific error conditions, optionally using a pagination token.
